content.rendered:
Second Canadian Chopin Competition

October 17- 23rd, 2004

The 2004 competition was the subject of a very successful television program produced by Bravo Television for their “Arts and Minds” program. The competition was also recorded and continues to be broadcast on CBC Radio.

Major sponsors have included Yamaha Canada and The Marie-Curie Sklodowska Association with professional support from the Royal Conservatory of Music.

Winners

Junior Division

Senior Division
First Prize– Cissy Zhou
Second Prize– Vicki Ning Wang
Third Prize– Daniel Wong 		First Prize– Avan Yu
Second Prize– Donna Lee
Third Prize– Thomas Yu

Jury

Piotr Paleczny (Chair)
Marc Durand
Marilyn Engle 		Marietta Orlov
John Perry

Committee

Artistic Director – Jun Fujimoto
Honorary Patron – Dr. Peter Simon

Organizing Committee

Lady Misek (Co-chair)
Diane Pogorzelski (Co-chair)
Marina Glista
Jean Graham
Ian Howey
Bernce Kinal 		Henry Lopinski
Janet Lopinski
Mitch Wywiorski
Halina Zielinski
Stan Zielinski
Jan Szymandera
